attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
pro mia websites exist to promote bulimia as a lifestyle choice which is likely to lead to severe physical and pyschological damage especially amoungst the body concious young.the damage done to individuals,families and friends by this disease is huge.
many such websites are based beyond our national borders and thus immune to our laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
